az: a creative heart obsessed with satisfying this dormant and uncaring society u have given them the stars at night and u have given them bountiful bouquets of sunflowers but 4 u there is only contempt and though u pour yourself into that frame and present it so proudly this world could not accept your masterpieces from the heart  so on that starry night u gave 2 us and u took away from us the one thing we never acknowledged your life
